    • Method Detail

      • settleLocation

        public boolean settleLocation(VertexLocation locationToSettle)
        Parameters:
        locationToSettle - = the location the current player wants to build
        pre
        the current player had enough resources to build and a settlement to build with
        post
        returns true if the VertexLocation was found in a Location of unsettledLocations and the boolean canBeSettled of that Location is true, returns false otherwise

      • settleEdge

        public boolean settleEdge(EdgeLocation edgeLocationToSettle)
        Parameters:
        edgeLocationToSettle - = the edge the current player wants to build a road on
        pre
        the current player had enough resources to build and a road
        post
        returns true if the EdgeLocation was found in an Edge in unsettledEdges and the player's id is found in the whoCanBuild array. Otherwise returns false

      • upgradeToCity

        public boolean upgradeToCity(VertexLocation locationToUpgrade)
        Parameters:
        locationToUpgrade - = the location the current player wants to upgrade the settlement
        pre
        the current player had enough resources to upgrade to a city and a city to build with
        post
        returns true if the VertexLocation is in a Location of settledLocations, if the Location ownerID matches the player, and if the Location's city boolean is false. Otherwise returns false.

      • getPortsPlayerHas

        public java.util.ArrayList<Port> getPortsPlayerHas()
        pre
        the player is going to maritime trade
        post
        returns the list of Ports that the player has a settlement or city on
